name: Create Pinterest pins from Google Sheets data using Pollination AI

authenticationType.label: No authenticationUse when no credentials are required for the request.

expect.name: stopOnHttpError
expect.label: Return error if HTTP request fails

expect.name: shareCookies
expect.label: Share cookies with other HTTP modules

mapper.content:
Hi [NAME],

Please check and approve the following for your new pin:

System name: {{11.`2`}}

Image link: {{16.webViewLink}}

Image prompt: {{11.`4`}}

Pin title: {{11.`6`}}

Pin description: {{11.`7`}}

Alt text: {{11.`9`}}

To approve: Reply to this email with just the word: APPROVE

To decline: Reply to this email with just the word: DECLINE
mapper.subject: Pinterest Image + Pin Approval Request (Make)

parameters.name: continueWhenNoRes
parameters.label: Continue the execution of the route even if the module finds no matches
